duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads and creates awareness of the company’s safety culture, demonstrating commitment to an injury-free environment through individual actions and mentoring others.
Manages subcontractors, company staff, suppliers, and programs such as Safety, Quality, and EEOC for projects.
Coordinates and manages the care, custody, and control of the project site.
Attends and participates in progress and project meetings, and manages the project schedule and budget.
Assists in the selection of formwork, tools, and equipment necessary for project operations.
Supports project closeouts, participates in project review meetings, and manages project buyout meetings.
Identifies and recruits top talent, and leads and promotes a culture of diversity and inclusion within the company.
Manages the largest, most complex stand-alone and/or multiple complex projects from initial planning to completion.
Provides management and oversight to multiple projects and project teams.
Participates in the development of relevant company training content and delivers leadership messages to multiple audiences.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in construction management, engineering or related field (Preferred)
